thread.title: Exelent stay for business
thread.title_full: Exelent stay for business - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarunas M
title: Exelent stay for business
text:
Good Hotel not so far from the centre of the London city.
Hot biscuites at check-in was pleasant surprise.:-) Immaculate rooms, tasty breakfast food. There was misunderstanding (not an hotel fault)with meeting room - assistant manager Pavlina was extremely helpful and kind. Meetballs at the lunch was so delicious.
Definitely would come back.
